Jinnō Shōtōki, pp. 179-181. ==Events of the Shōtai era== * 7 December, 899 (Shōtai 2, 1st day of the 11th month): At winter solstice, all the great officials of the empire presented themselves in the Imperial court.Titsingh, p. 130. * 6 February 900 (Shōtai 3, 3rd day of the 1st month): The emperor went to visit his father in the place former-Emperor Uda had chosen to live after abdication.Titsingh, pp. 130-131. * 900 (Shōtai 3, 10th month): The former-Emperor Uda traveled to in what is now Wakayama Prefecture.
